Dating: NEW KINGDOM (not before); 19TH DYNASTY; NEW KINGDOM (not after)
Name: Fragments of relief
Description: These three fragments of relief probably come from the wall of a Theban tomb. They represent the heads of dignitaries. Even though the state of the fragments is very deteriorated, the style and the colours demonstrate that they belong to the art of the New Kingdom and more specifically that of the 19th Dynasty.
